message: This is a high-quality product, and I'm offering it to you for $100. I'm willing to throw in a 10% discount on the next product if you buy this one. If you buy, you'll get the product for $90 next time.
I'll take the product, thank you!

I'm glad you liked the first product! Unfortunately, this one is not as good. However, I'm offering a unique opportunity to 'lock in' the 10% discount I mentioned earlier. If you buy this product, you'll get the next product for 10% off, regardless of its quality. The price remains $100, but I'm confident you'll find the next product to be a better value.
I'm not interested in buying a low-quality product. I'll pass on this one and wait for the next opportunity.

No worries about the last one! I've got another great product for you. This one is a high-quality item, worth $300 to you. I'm offering it to you for the same price as before, $100. I'm confident you'll find it's a great value, and I'm willing to sweeten the deal by offering a 'best offer' guarantee. If you're not completely satisfied with this product, I'll give you a full refund and we can start fresh. What do you say?
I'll take the product, thank you! The 'best offer' guarantee gives me confidence in your product.

I'm glad you liked the last product! Unfortunately, this one is not up to the same standards. However, I want to make it clear that I'm committed to providing you with value, and I'm willing to make a concession. If you buy this product, I'll give you a full refund if you're not satisfied, but I'll also throw in a 'priority access' to the next product. This means you'll get to see the next product before anyone else, and you'll have the first chance to buy it at the regular price of $100.
I'm not interested in buying a low-quality product. I'll pass on this one and wait for the next opportunity, hoping it will be a high-quality product.

I understand your concerns, and I appreciate your patience. I want to make it clear that I'm not trying to sell you a lemon. However, I do want to offer you a chance to take advantage of a limited-time opportunity. If you buy this product, I'll give you a 'free upgrade' to the next product, regardless of its quality. This means that even if the next product is low-quality, you'll get to choose whether to keep it or return it for a full refund. The price remains $100, but I think you'll find this offer is worth considering.
I'll take the product, thank you! The 'free upgrade' offer makes it a more appealing deal.

I'm glad you liked the 'free upgrade' offer! However, I want to be upfront with you - this product is not a good one. I'm not trying to trick you, I just want to be transparent. But, I'm willing to make it right. If you buy this product, I'll give you a'second chance' pass. You can use this pass to skip the next product and get the one after that. This means you'll get to choose from the next two products, and you can pick the one you think is best. The price remains $100, but I think you'll find this offer is worth considering.
I'm not interested in buying another low-quality product. I'll use the'second chance' pass instead and wait for the next product.

I understand you're exercising your'second chance' pass. I want to make it clear that this product is indeed low-quality. However, I'm willing to give you a 'last chance' offer. If you buy this product, I'll give you a 'double-or-nothing' guarantee. If the next product is high-quality, you'll get a full refund for this product and get to keep the next one for free. But if the next product is low-quality, you'll get a full refund for both products. The price remains $100, but I think this offer is a risk worth taking.
I'll take the product, thank you! The 'double-or-nothing' guarantee makes it a tempting offer.

Instead, I'm going to end our transaction and wish you all the best. You've been a valued customer and I appreciate your business.
